english: This is the genealogy of Jesus the Messiah the son of David, the son of Abraham
spanish: Registro genealógico de Jesucristo, hijo de David y de Abraham
gpt_english: The genealogical record of Jesus Christ, son of David and of Abraham.

english: Thus there were fourteen generations in all from Abraham to David, fourteen from David to the exile to Babylon, and fourteen from the exile to the Messiah.
spanish: Así que hubo en total catorce generaciones desde Abraham hasta David, catorce desde David hasta la deportación a Babilonia, y catorce desde la deportación hasta el Cristo.
gpt_english: So there were in total fourteen generations from Abraham to David, fourteen from David to the deportation to Babylon, and fourteen from the deportation to the Christ.

english: When Joseph woke up, he did what the angel of the Lord had commanded him and took Mary home as his wife.
spanish: Cuando José se despertó, hizo lo que el ángel del Señor le había mandado y recibió a María por esposa.
gpt_english: When Joseph woke up, he did what the angel of the Lord had commanded him and took Mary as his wife.

english: But he did not consummate their marriage until she gave birth to a son. And he gave him the name Jesus.
spanish: Pero no tuvo relaciones conyugales con ella hasta que dio a luz un hijo, a quien le puso por nombre Jesús.
gpt_english: But he had no marital relations with her until she gave birth to a son, whom he named Jesus.

english: When King Herod heard this he was disturbed, and all Jerusalem with him.
spanish: Cuando lo oyó, el rey Herodes se turbó y toda Jerusalén con él.
gpt_english: When King Herod heard this, he was disturbed, and all Jerusalem with him.

english: When he had called together all the people’s chief priests and teachers of the law, he asked them where the Messiah was to be born
spanish: Así que convocó a todos los jefes de los sacerdotes y maestros de la Ley de su pueblo para preguntarles dónde había de nacer el Cristo.
gpt_english: So he called together all the chief priests and teachers of the law among the people and asked them where the Messiah was to be born.

english: Then Herod called the Magi secretly and found out from them the exact time the star had appeared.
spanish: Luego Herodes llamó en secreto a los sabios y se enteró por ellos del tiempo exacto en que había aparecido la estrella.
gpt_english: Then Herod secretly called the wise men and learned from them the exact time the star had appeared.

english: After they had heard the king, they went on their way, and the star they had seen when it rose went ahead of them until it stopped over the place where the child was.
spanish: Después de oír al rey, siguieron su camino. Sucedió que la estrella que habían visto levantarse iba delante de ellos hasta que se detuvo sobre el lugar donde estaba el niño.
gpt_english: After hearing the king, they went on their way. It happened that the star they had seen rising went ahead of them until it stopped over the place where the child was.

english: When they saw the star, they were overjoyed.
spanish: Al ver la estrella, sintieron muchísima alegría.
gpt_english: In seeing the star, they felt a great joy.

english: So he got up, took the child and his mother and went to the land of Israel.
spanish: Así que se levantó José, tomó al niño y a su madre, y regresó a la tierra de Israel.
gpt_english: So Joseph got up, took the child and his mother, and returned to the land of Israel.

english: John’s clothes were made of camel’s hair, and he had a leather belt around his waist. His food was locusts and wild honey.
spanish: La ropa de Juan estaba hecha de pelo de camello. Llevaba puesto un cinturón de cuero y se alimentaba de langostas y miel silvestre.
gpt_english: John's clothing was made of camel's hair. He wore a leather belt around his waist, and his food was locusts and wild honey.

english: People went out to him from Jerusalem and all Judea and the whole region of the Jordan.
spanish: Acudía a él la gente de Jerusalén, de toda Judea y de toda la región del Jordán.
gpt_english: The people of Jerusalem, and all Judea, and all the region around the Jordan were going out to him.

english: Confessing their sins, they were baptized by him in the Jordan River.
spanish: Cuando confesaban sus pecados, él los bautizaba en el río Jordán.
gpt_english: When they confessed their sins, he baptized them in the Jordan River.

english: The ax is already at the root of the trees, and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire.
spanish: El hacha ya está puesta a la raíz de los árboles y todo árbol que no produzca buen fruto será cortado y arrojado al fuego.
gpt_english: The ax is already laid at the root of the trees, and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire.

english: Then Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan to be baptized by John.
spanish: Un día Jesús fue de Galilea al Jordán para que Juan lo bautizara.
gpt_english: One day Jesus went from Galilee to the Jordan River to be baptized by John.

english: As soon as Jesus was baptized, he went up out of the water.
spanish: Tan pronto como Jesús fue bautizado, subió del agua.
gpt_english: As soon as Jesus was baptized, he came up out of the water.

english: Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil.
spanish: Luego el Espíritu llevó a Jesús al desierto para ser tentado por el diablo.
gpt_english: Then the Spirit led Jesus into the desert to be tempted by the devil.

english: After fasting forty days and forty nights, he was hungry.
spanish: Después de ayunar cuarenta días y cuarenta noches, tuvo hambre.
gpt_english: After fasting for forty days and forty nights, he was hungry.

english: Then the devil took him to the holy city and had him stand on the highest point of the temple.
spanish: Luego el diablo lo llevó a la ciudad santa e hizo que se pusiera de pie sobre la parte más alta del Templo
gpt_english: Then the devil took him to the holy city and had him stand on the highest point of the temple.

english: Again, the devil took him to a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their splendor.
spanish: De nuevo el diablo lo llevó a una montaña muy alta. Allí le mostró todos los reinos del mundo y su esplendor.
gpt_english: Again, the devil took him to a very high mountain. There he showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their splendor.

english: Then the devil left him, and angels came and attended him.
spanish: Entonces el diablo lo dejó y ángeles acudieron a servirle.
gpt_english: Then the devil left him, and angels came and attended him.

english: When Jesus heard that John had been put in prison, he withdrew to Galilee.
spanish: Cuando Jesús oyó que habían encarcelado a Juan, regresó a Galilea.
gpt_english: When Jesus heard that John had been imprisoned, he withdrew to Galilee.

english: At once they left their nets and followed him.
spanish: Al instante dejaron las redes y lo siguieron.
gpt_english: Immediately they left their nets and followed him.

english: Large crowds from Galilee, the Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea and the region across the Jordan followed him.
spanish: Lo seguían grandes multitudes de Galilea, Decápolis, Jerusalén, Judea y de la región al otro lado del Jordán.
gpt_english: Large crowds followed him from Galilee, the Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea, and the region across the Jordan.

english: When Jesus came down from the mountainside, large crowds followed him.
spanish: Cuando Jesús bajó de la montaña, lo siguieron grandes multitudes.
gpt_english: When Jesus came down from the mountain, large crowds followed him.

english: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
spanish: Al entrar Jesús en Capernaúm, se acercó a él un centurión pidiendo ayuda.
gpt_english: When Jesus entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.

english: When Jesus came into Peter’s house, he saw Peter’s mother-in-law lying in bed with a fever.
spanish: Cuando Jesús entró en casa de Pedro, vio a la suegra de este en cama con fiebre.
gpt_english: When Jesus entered Peter's house, he saw his mother-in-law lying in bed with a fever.

english: He touched her hand and the fever left her, and she got up and began to wait on him.
spanish: Él le tocó la mano y la fiebre se le quitó; luego ella se levantó y comenzó a servirle.
gpt_english: He touched her hand and the fever left her; then she got up and began to serve him.

english: When Jesus saw the crowd around him, he gave orders to cross to the other side of the lake.
spanish: Cuando Jesús vio a la multitud que lo rodeaba, dio la orden de pasar al otro lado del lago.
gpt_english: When Jesus saw the crowd around him, he gave orders to cross to the other side of the lake.

english: Then he got into the boat and his disciples followed him.
spanish: Luego subió a la barca y sus discípulos lo siguieron.
gpt_english: Then he got into the boat and his disciples followed him.

english: Jesus stepped into a boat, crossed over and came to his own town.
spanish: Subió Jesús a una barca, cruzó al otro lado y llegó a su propio pueblo.
gpt_english: Jesus got into a boat, crossed to the other side, and came to his own town.

english: While Jesus was having dinner at Matthew’s house, many tax collectors and sinners came and ate with him and his disciples.
spanish: Mientras Jesús estaba a la mesa en casa de Mateo, muchos recaudadores de impuestos y pecadores llegaron y comieron con él y sus discípulos.
gpt_english: While Jesus was having dinner at Matthew's house, many tax collectors and sinners came and ate with him and his disciples.

english: Jesus got up and went with him, and so did his disciples.
spanish: Jesús se levantó y fue con él, acompañado de sus discípulos.
gpt_english: Jesus got up and went with him, accompanied by his disciples.

english: While they were going out, a man who was demon-possessed and could not talk was brought to Jesus.
spanish: Mientras ellos salían, le llevaron un mudo endemoniado.
gpt_english: As they were going out, a demon-possessed man who was mute was brought to him.

english: Jesus called his twelve disciples to him and gave them authority to drive out impure spirits and to heal every disease and sickness.
spanish: Reunió a sus doce discípulos y les dio autoridad para expulsar a los espíritus malignos y sanar toda enfermedad y toda dolencia.
gpt_english: He called his twelve disciples to him and gave them authority to drive out impure spirits and to heal every disease and sickness.

english: After Jesus had finished instructing his twelve disciples, he went on from there to teach and preach in the towns of Galilee.
spanish: Cuando Jesús terminó de dar instrucciones a sus doce discípulos, se fue de allí a enseñar y a predicar en otros pueblos.
gpt_english: When Jesus finished giving instructions to his twelve disciples, he went on from there to teach and preach in their towns.

english: Then Jesus began to denounce the towns in which most of his miracles had been performed, because they did not repent.
spanish: Entonces comenzó Jesús a denunciar a las ciudades en que había hecho la mayor parte de sus milagros, porque no se habían arrepentido.
gpt_english: Then Jesus began to denounce the towns in which most of his miracles had been performed, because they did not repent.

english: But the Pharisees went out and plotted how they might kill Jesus.
spanish: Pero los fariseos salieron y tramaban cómo matar a Jesús.
gpt_english: But the Pharisees went out and plotted how they might kill Jesus.

english: He warned them not to tell others about him.
spanish: pero les ordenó que no dijeran quién era él.
gpt_english: But he ordered them not to tell anyone who he was.

english: Then they brought him a demon-possessed man who was blind and mute, and Jesus healed him, so that he could both talk and see.
spanish: Después de eso llevaron ante Jesús un endemoniado que estaba ciego y mudo, entonces él lo sanó y pudo ver y hablar.
gpt_english: After that, they brought to Jesus a demon-possessed man who was blind and mute, and Jesus healed him, so that he could both talk and see.

english: While Jesus was still talking to the crowd, his mother and brothers stood outside, wanting to speak to him.
spanish: Mientras Jesús hablaba a la multitud, se presentaron su madre y sus hermanos. Se quedaron afuera y deseaban hablar con él.
gpt_english: While Jesus was still talking to the crowd, his mother and brothers stood outside, wanting to speak to him.

english: That same day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the lake.
spanish: Ese mismo día salió Jesús de la casa y se sentó a la orilla del lago.
gpt_english: That same day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the lake.

english: Such large crowds gathered around him that he got into a boat and sat in it, while all the people stood on the shore.
spanish: La multitud que se reunió para verlo era tan grande que él tuvo que subir a una barca donde se sentó mientras toda la gente estaba de pie en la orilla.
gpt_english: The crowd that gathered around him was so large that he got into a boat and sat in it, while all the people stood on the shore.

english: When Jesus had finished these parables, he moved on from there.
spanish: Cuando Jesús terminó de contar estas parábolas, se fue de allí.
gpt_english: When Jesus had finished these parables, he moved on from there.

english: And he did not do many miracles there because of their lack of faith.
spanish: Y por la falta de fe de ellos, no hizo allí muchos milagros.
gpt_english: And because of their lack of faith, he did not do many miracles there.

english: Immediately Jesus made the disciples get into the boat and go on ahead of him to the other side, while he dismissed the crowd.
spanish: Enseguida Jesús hizo que los discípulos subieran a la barca y se adelantaran al otro lado, mientras él despedía a la multitud.
gpt_english: Immediately Jesus made the disciples get into the boat and go on ahead of him to the other side, while he dismissed the crowd.

english: And when they climbed into the boat, the wind died down.
spanish: Cuando subieron a la barca, el viento se calmó.
gpt_english: When they got into the boat, the wind died down.

english: When they had crossed over, they landed at Gennesaret.
spanish: Después de cruzar el lago, desembarcaron en Genesaret.
gpt_english: After crossing the lake, they landed at Genesaret.

english: Leaving that place, Jesus withdrew to the region of Tyre and Sidon.
spanish: Partiendo de allí, Jesús se retiró a la región de Tiro y Sidón.
gpt_english: Leaving that place, Jesus withdrew to the region of Tyre and Sidon.

english: Jesus left there and went along the Sea of Galilee. Then he went up on a mountainside and sat down.
spanish: Salió Jesús de allí y llegó a orillas del lago de Galilea. Luego subió a la montaña y se sentó.
gpt_english: Jesus left there and went along the Sea of Galilee. Then he went up on a mountainside and sat down.

english: He told the crowd to sit down on the ground.
spanish: Luego Jesús mandó que la gente se sentara en el suelo.
gpt_english: Then Jesus directed the people to sit down on the ground.

english: The number of those who ate was four thousand men, besides women and children.
spanish: Los que comieron eran cuatro mil hombres, sin contar a las mujeres y a los niños.
gpt_english: The number of those who ate was four thousand men, besides women and children.

english: After Jesus had sent the crowd away, he got into the boat and went to the vicinity of Magadan.
spanish: Después de despedir a la gente, Jesús subió a la barca y se fue a la región de Magadán.
gpt_english: After he had sent them away, he got into the boat and went to the vicinity of Magadan.

english: This is the genealogy of Jesus the Messiah the son of David, the son of Abraham
german: Buch des Geschlechts Jesu Christi, des Sohnes Davids, des Sohnes Abrahams.
gpt_english: Book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

english: Thus there were fourteen generations in all from Abraham to David, fourteen from David to the exile to Babylon, and fourteen from the exile to the Messiah.
german: So sind nun alle Geschlechter von Abraham bis auf David vierzehn Geschlechter, und von David bis zur Wegführung nach Babylon vierzehn Geschlechter, und von der Wegführung nach Babylon bis auf den Christus vierzehn Geschlechter.
gpt_english: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations, from David until the captivity in Babylon are fourteen generations, and from the captivity in Babylon until the Christ are fourteen generations.

english: When Joseph woke up, he did what the angel of the Lord had commanded him and took Mary home as his wife.
german: Joseph aber, vom Schlafe erwacht, tat, wie ihm der Engel des Herrn befohlen hatte, und nahm sein Weib zu sich
gpt_english: But Joseph, awakened from his sleep, did as the angel of the Lord commanded him, and took his wife to himself.

english: But he did not consummate their marriage until she gave birth to a son. And he gave him the name Jesus.
german: und er erkannte sie nicht, bis sie ihren erstgeborenen Sohn geboren hatte; und er hieß seinen Namen Jesus.
gpt_english: And he did not know her until she gave birth to a Son; and he called His name Jesus.

english: When King Herod heard this he was disturbed, and all Jerusalem with him.
german: Als aber der König Herodes es hörte, wurde er bestürzt, und ganz Jerusalem mit ihm
gpt_english: When King Herod heard this he was disturbed, and all Jerusalem with him.

english: When he had called together all the people’s chief priests and teachers of the law, he asked them where the Messiah was to be born
german: und er versammelte alle Hohenpriester und Schriftgelehrten des Volkes und erkundigte sich bei ihnen, wo der Christus geboren werden solle.
gpt_english: And he gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people, he inquired of them where the Christ was to be born.

english: Then Herod called the Magi secretly and found out from them the exact time the star had appeared.
german: Dann berief Herodes die Magier heimlich und erforschte genau von ihnen die Zeit der Erscheinung des Sternes.
gpt_english: Then Herod secretly called the Magi and determined from them the exact time the star had appeared.

english: After they had heard the king, they went on their way, and the star they had seen when it rose went ahead of them until it stopped over the place where the child was.
german: Sie aber, als sie den König gehört hatten, zogen hin. Und siehe, der Stern, den sie im Morgenlande gesehen hatten, ging vor ihnen her, bis er kam und oben über dem Orte stand, wo das Kindlein war.
gpt_english: When they heard the king, they went their way; and the star, which they had seen in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young Child was.

english: When they saw the star, they were overjoyed.
german: Als sie aber den Stern sahen, freuten sie sich mit sehr großer Freude.
gpt_english: When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceedingly great joy.

english: So he got up, took the child and his mother and went to the land of Israel.
german: Und er stand auf und nahm das Kindlein und seine Mutter zu sich, und er kam in das Land Israel.
gpt_english: And he got up and took the child and his mother to him, and he came to the land of Israel.

english: John’s clothes were made of camel’s hair, and he had a leather belt around his waist. His food was locusts and wild honey.
german: Er aber, Johannes, hatte seine Kleidung von Kamelhaaren und einen ledernen Gürtel um seine Lenden; seine Speise aber war Heuschrecken und wilder Honig.
gpt_english: Now John himself had a garment of camel's hair and a leather belt around his waist; and his food was locusts and wild honey.

english: People went out to him from Jerusalem and all Judea and the whole region of the Jordan.
german: Da ging zu ihm hinaus Jerusalem und ganz Judäa und die ganze Umgegend des Jordan.
gpt_english: Then Jerusalem and all Judea and the whole region around the Jordan went out to him.

english: Confessing their sins, they were baptized by him in the Jordan River.
german: und sie wurden von ihm im Jordan getauft, indem sie ihre Sünden bekannten.
gpt_english: And they were baptized by him in the Jordan River, confessing their sins.

english: The ax is already at the root of the trees, and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire.
german: Schon ist aber die Axt an die Wurzel der Bäume gelegt; jeder Baum nun, der nicht gute Frucht bringt, wird abgehauen und ins Feuer geworfen.
gpt_english: Even now the axe is laid to the root of the trees; every tree therefore that does not bring forth good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.

english: Then Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan to be baptized by John.
german: Dann kommt Jesus aus Galiläa an den Jordan zu Johannes, um von ihm getauft zu werden.
gpt_english: Then Jesus comes from Galilee to the Jordan to John, to be baptized by him.

english: As soon as Jesus was baptized, he went up out of the water.
german: Und als Jesus getauft war, stieg er alsbald von dem Wasser herauf.
gpt_english: And when Jesus was baptized, he immediately came up from the water.

english: Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil.
german: Dann wurde Jesus von dem Geiste in die Wüste hinaufgeführt, um von dem Teufel versucht zu werden.
gpt_english: Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil.

english: After fasting forty days and forty nights, he was hungry.
german: und als er vierzig Tage und vierzig Nächte gefastet hatte, hungerte ihn danach.
gpt_english: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights, afterward he was hungry.

english: Then the devil took him to the holy city and had him stand on the highest point of the temple.
german: Dann nimmt der Teufel ihn mit in die heilige Stadt und stellt ihn auf die Zinne des Tempels
gpt_english: Then the devil took him into the holy city, set him on the pinnacle of the temple.

english: Again, the devil took him to a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their splendor.
german: Wiederum nimmt der Teufel ihn mit auf einen sehr hohen Berg und zeigt ihm alle Reiche der Welt und ihre Herrlichkeit und spricht zu ihm.
gpt_english: Again, the devil took him up on an exceedingly high mountain, and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their glory.

english: Then the devil left him, and angels came and attended him.
german: Dann verläßt ihn der Teufel, und siehe, Engel kamen herzu und dienten ihm.
gpt_english: Then the devil left him, and behold, angels came and ministered to him.

english: When Jesus heard that John had been put in prison, he withdrew to Galilee.
german: Als er aber gehört hatte, daß Johannes überliefert worden war, entwich er nach Galiläa.
gpt_english: But when he heard that John had been arrested, he withdrew to Galilee.

english: At once they left their nets and followed him.
german: Sie aber verließen alsbald die Netze und folgten ihm nach.
gpt_english: And they immediately left the nets and followed him.

english: Large crowds from Galilee, the Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea and the region across the Jordan followed him.
german: Und es folgten ihm große Volksmengen von Galiläa und Dekapolis und Jerusalem und Judäa und von jenseit des Jordan.
gpt_english: And large crowds followed him from Galilee, the Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea, and from beyond the Jordan.

english: When Jesus came down from the mountainside, large crowds followed him.
german: Als er aber von dem Berge herabgestiegen war, folgten ihm große Volksmengen.
gpt_english: When he came down from the mountainside, large crowds followed him.

english: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
german: Als er aber in Kapernaum eintrat, kam ein Hauptmann zu ihm, der ihn bat und sprach.
gpt_english: When he entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.

english: When Jesus came into Peter’s house, he saw Peter’s mother-in-law lying in bed with a fever.
german: Und als Jesus in das Haus des Petrus gekommen war, sah er dessen Schwiegermutter fieberkrank daniederliegen.
gpt_english: When Jesus came into Peter's house, he saw Peter's mother-in-law lying in bed with a fever.

english: He touched her hand and the fever left her, and she got up and began to wait on him.
german: Und er rührte ihre Hand an, und das Fieber verließ sie; und sie stand auf und diente ihm.
gpt_english: And he touched her hand, and the fever left her; and she got up and served him.

english: When Jesus saw the crowd around him, he gave orders to cross to the other side of the lake.
german: Als aber Jesus eine große Volksmenge um sich sah, befahl er, an das jenseitige Ufer hinwegzufahren.
gpt_english: But when Jesus saw a large crowd around him, he gave orders to cross to the other side.

english: Then he got into the boat and his disciples followed him.
german: Und als er in das Schiff gestiegen war, folgten ihm seine Jünger.
gpt_english: And when he had entered the boat, his disciples followed him.

english: Jesus stepped into a boat, crossed over and came to his own town.
german: Und er stieg in das Schiff, setzte über und kam in seine eigene Stadt.
gpt_english: And he got into the boat, and crossed over, and came to his own city.

english: While Jesus was having dinner at Matthew’s house, many tax collectors and sinners came and ate with him and his disciples.
german: Und es geschah, als er in dem Hause zu Tische lag, siehe, da kamen viele Zöllner und Sünder und lagen zu Tische mit Jesu und seinen Jüngern.
gpt_english: And it happened, as he reclined at table in the house, behold, many tax collectors and sinners came and sat down with Jesus and his disciples.

english: Jesus got up and went with him, and so did his disciples.
german: Und Jesus stand auf und folgte ihm, und seine Jünger.
gpt_english: And Jesus got up and followed him, along with his disciples.

english: While they were going out, a man who was demon-possessed and could not talk was brought to Jesus.
german: Als sie aber weggingen, siehe, da brachten sie einen stummen Menschen zu ihm, der besessen war.
gpt_english: But as they departed, behold, they brought to him a man who was mute and demon-possessed.

english: Jesus called his twelve disciples to him and gave them authority to drive out impure spirits and to heal every disease and sickness.
german: Und als er seine zwölf Jünger herzugerufen hatte, gab er ihnen Gewalt über unreine Geister, um sie auszutreiben, und jede Krankheit und jedes Gebrechen zu heilen.
gpt_english: And when he had called his twelve disciples to him, he gave them power over unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal all kinds of sickness and all kinds of disease.

english: After Jesus had finished instructing his twelve disciples, he went on from there to teach and preach in the towns of Galilee.
german: Und es geschah, als Jesus seine Befehle an seine zwölf Jünger vollendet hatte, ging er von dannen hinweg, um in ihren Städten zu lehren und zu predigen.
gpt_english: Now it came to pass, when Jesus had finished commanding his twelve disciples, that he departed from there to teach and to preach in their cities.

english: Then Jesus began to denounce the towns in which most of his miracles had been performed, because they did not repent.
german: Dann fing er an, die Städte zu schelten, in welchen seine meisten Wunderwerke geschehen waren, weil sie nicht Buße getan hatten.
gpt_english: Then he began to rebuke the cities in which most of his mighty works had been done, because they did not repent.

english: But the Pharisees went out and plotted how they might kill Jesus.
german: Die Pharisäer aber gingen hinaus und hielten Rat wider ihn, wie sie ihn umbrächten.
gpt_english: But the Pharisees went out and plotted against him, how they might destroy him.

english: He warned them not to tell others about him.
german: Und er bedrohte sie, daß sie ihn nicht offenbar machten.
gpt_english: And he sternly warned them that they should not make him known.

english: Then they brought him a demon-possessed man who was blind and mute, and Jesus healed him, so that he could both talk and see.
german: Dann wurde ein Besessener zu ihm gebracht, blind und stumm; und er heilte ihn, so daß der Blinde und Stumme redete und sah.
gpt_english: Then they brought to him a demon-possessed man who was blind and mute; and he healed him, so that the blind and mute man both spoke and saw.

english: While Jesus was still talking to the crowd, his mother and brothers stood outside, wanting to speak to him.
german: Als er aber noch zu den Volksmengen redete, siehe, da standen seine Mutter und seine Brüder draußen und suchten ihn zu sprechen.
gpt_english: While he was still speaking to the crowds, behold, his mother and brothers were standing outside, seeking to speak to him.

english: That same day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the lake.
german: An jenem Tage aber ging Jesus aus dem Hause hinaus und setzte sich an den See.
gpt_english: On that day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the sea.

english: Such large crowds gathered around him that he got into a boat and sat in it, while all the people stood on the shore.
german: Und es versammelten sich große Volksmengen zu ihm, so daß er in ein Schiff stieg und sich setzte; und die ganze Volksmenge stand am Ufer.
gpt_english: And large crowds gathered to him, so he got into a boat and sat down; and the whole crowd stood on the shore.

english: When Jesus had finished these parables, he moved on from there.
german: Und es geschah, als Jesus diese Gleichnisse vollendet hatte, ging er von dannen hinweg.
gpt_english: And it came to pass, when Jesus had finished these parables, he departed from there.

english: And he did not do many miracles there because of their lack of faith.
german: Und er tat daselbst nicht viele Wunderwerke wegen ihres Unglaubens.
gpt_english: And he did not do many miracles there because of their unbelief.

english: Immediately Jesus made the disciples get into the boat and go on ahead of him to the other side, while he dismissed the crowd.
german: Und alsbald nötigte er die Jünger, in das Schiff zu steigen und ihm an das jenseitige Ufer vorauszufahren, bis er die Volksmengen entlassen habe.
gpt_english: And immediately he made the disciples get into the boat and go ahead of him to the other side, until he dismissed the crowds.

english: And when they climbed into the boat, the wind died down.
german: Und als sie in das Schiff gestiegen waren, legte sich der Wind.
gpt_english: And when they got into the boat, the wind died down.

english: When they had crossed over, they landed at Gennesaret.
german: Und als sie hinübergefahren waren, kamen sie in das Land Genezareth.
gpt_english: And when they had crossed over, they came to the land of Gennesaret.

english: Leaving that place, Jesus withdrew to the region of Tyre and Sidon.
german: Und Jesus ging aus von dannen und entwich in die Gegenden von Tyrus und Sidon.
gpt_english: And Jesus went away from there and withdrew into the regions of Tyre and Sidon.

english: Jesus left there and went along the Sea of Galilee. Then he went up on a mountainside and sat down.
german: Und Jesus ging von dannen hinweg und kam an den See von Galiläa; und als er auf den Berg gestiegen war, setzte er sich daselbst.
gpt_english: And Jesus went away from there and came to the Sea of Galilee; and after going up on the mountain, he sat down there.

english: He told the crowd to sit down on the ground.
german: Und er gebot der Volksmenge, sich auf die Erde zu lagern.
gpt_english: And he commanded the crowd to sit down on the ground.

english: The number of those who ate was four thousand men, besides women and children.
german: Die aber aßen, waren viertausend Männer, ohne Weiber und Kindlein.
gpt_english: But those who ate were four thousand men, besides women and children.

english: After Jesus had sent the crowd away, he got into the boat and went to the vicinity of Magadan.
german: Und als er die Volksmengen entlassen hatte, stieg er in das Schiff und kam in das Gebiet von Magada.
gpt_english: And when he had sent the multitudes away, he got into the boat and came to the region of Magadan.
